Kendogu.name: KENDOGU
Kendogu.summary: "KENDOGU," highlights the art of crafting Kendo equipment and the history and philosophy of Kendo. It emphasizes that Kendo is a martial art focused on training human character through the way of the sword.

NishimuraDocumentaryTheSpiritOfKendo:Pat.name: Nishimura Documentary   The Spirit of Kendo: Path of No Regret    己に挑む六番勝負～剣道・西村英久
NishimuraDocumentaryTheSpiritOfKendo:Pat.summary: This video belongs to NHK World (Japan). This is just a repost.

WhatIsKendo?(Complete).name: What is Kendo? (Complete)
WhatIsKendo?(Complete).summary: This video provides a comprehensive overview of Kendo, a traditional Japanese martial art rooted in samurai swordsmanship. It highlights that Kendo is not just about defeating an opponent but also about mental discipline and training the mind.
